meaning_str.bing:
v. 演唱；鸣；啼；唱（歌）
n. (风,小河,开水壶等的)呜呜声；〈美口〉歌唱会
网络. 唱歌；欢唱；唱吧

(风,小河,开水壶等的)呜呜声；〈美口〉歌唱会

唱；唱歌；演唱；歌唱；歌颂；吟唱；鸣叫；啼鸣；鸣；啼；发嗖嗖声；发出嗡嗡声；呜呜作响；用诗（或歌）赞颂；高声叫喊；随音乐哼唱
歌唱；演唱；歌声；歌唱会；唱歌表演；合唱团演出；业余歌唱活动；鸟鸣；呜呜声；嗖嗖声

1.en: Houston was due to sing at the Grammy Awards on Sunday, which no doubt will now become a tribute to her life and career.
1.cn: 休斯顿原定于周日在格莱美唱片奖上献唱，现在，这无疑将成为她的生命和职业生涯的一场悼念。

2.en: Sing songs of him, great Thrall, for he was part of those who saved the world for you.
2.cn: 他是替你拯救这个世界的英雄之一，所以为他吟唱诗歌吧，伟大的索尔。

3.en: " said the ant, laughing and shutting up his granary. " Since you could sing all summer, you may dance all winter.
3.cn: 蚂蚁笑着关闭了他的谷仓，说：“你可以整个夏天歌唱，那你也可以整个冬天都跳舞。”

0.en: Merry Christmas. Now, let's all sing a Christmas song. Yes.
0.cn: 圣诞节快乐！现在我们来唱首圣诞歌吧！好的！

1.en: Sing to us! Please don't make me sing to you.
1.cn: 来一首! 求求你们别让我唱歌出丑啦。

2.en: Madame Gazelle, can you sing your song now?
2.cn: 加塞列小姐，你现在可以唱歌吗？

3.en: We used to sing it every night at the same time, no matter how far apart we were. What I wouldn't give to sing it to her, one last time.
3.cn: 我们以前每天晚上都会唱，一起唱，不管我们相隔多远，但我却不能再为她唱最后一次。

4.en: Children, let us all sing a song. Yes. The bing bong song, please. Oh, I am not sure. Please, Madam Gazelle, sing the bing bong song. All right.
4.cn: 孩子们，我们来一起唱首歌怎么样？我们来唱乒乓歌吧。噢，这首歌我不太熟悉。拜托了， 羚羊夫人，唱一首乒乓歌吧。那好吧 。

5.en: Which we don't know, because we haven't actually heard you sing.
5.cn: 我们还不清楚这个，因为我们还没听你唱过。

6.en: Delphine sang a pretty French song last night. Can we teach her an English song? How about "The Bing-bong Song"? Yes, sing me this "Bing-bong song". It would be good for my English.
6.cn: 戴芬昨天晚上为我们唱了一首好听的法语歌。那我们也为戴芬唱一首歌吧？唱那首乒乓歌吧？是啊，就唱这首乒乓歌吧，我对这首歌非常的好奇。

7.en: Can we have the Bing Bong song, please? Please, Madam Gazelle, sing the Bing Bong Song. All right.
7.cn: 我们可不可以唱Bing Bong歌呢？拜托，羚羊夫人。唱Bing Bong歌吧。好吧。

8.en: Team. But I'm here alone. Actually, I'm here to sing with her.
8.cn: 队伍，但我是一个人。实际上，我来这里和她唱的。

9.en: Will you sing it for us? Please? Okay. Cuddle close. Scooch in.
9.cn: 你能唱给我们听吗？拜托。好吧。相互依偎，钻进怀里。

10.en: Sound of music sing-along? That used to be our thing, but that's cool.
10.cn: "音乐之声二人唱"，以前是咱俩的活动，不过没关系。

11.en: You don't think she's gonna want to grab the microphone and sing Part-time Lover?
11.cn: 你以为她不想唱《兼职情人》（斯蒂夫温伍德的名曲）吗？

12.en: We are the dinosaurs, the dinosaurs, the dinosaurs. We are the dinosaurs. Listen to us sing.
12.cn: 我们是恐龙，是恐龙，是恐龙，我们是恐龙，一起来唱。

13.en: Now, we can sing our Christmas song. Would you like to hear it, boys and girls? Yes.
13.cn: 现在我们可以唱圣诞歌曲了。你们想不想听啊，孩子们？想听！

14.en: Trust me, Clark. I'm a Molahonkey virgin. You're gonna make me sing it now?
14.cn: 相信我，克拉克，我从没听过马拉宏奇歌谣。你是让我现在就唱给你听吗？

15.en: Okay, so what do you guys got going on tonight? Raj is taking me to the sound of music sing-along.
15.cn: 好啦，你们今晚有什么安排？拉杰要带我去"音乐之声二人唱"。

16.en: You're not gonna hear me sing, guys. Because Gabriella won't even talk to me and I don't know why.
16.cn: 你们不会听到我唱了，因为盖比瑞拉不和我讲话了，我不知道为什么。

17.en: He used to sing the Molahonkey song. The what? The Molahonkey song. I thought everyone knew it.
17.cn: 他以前会给我唱马拉宏奇歌谣。什么歌？马拉宏奇歌谣，我以为大家都知道。

18.en: When I was little, my mother would sing a song about a special river called Ahtohallan, that was said to hold all the answers about the past, about what we are a part of.
18.cn: 我小时候，我妈妈会给我唱一首歌，歌里唱了一条特别的河 叫作亚托哈伦，据说那条河里有所有关于过去的答案，关于我们身处的这个世界。

19.en: The crowd, they would sing along and be totally immersed in his music. And I had this epiphany, that I was missing the point.
19.cn: 人群跟着一起唱，完全沉浸在他的音乐中，我领悟到，是我错过了什么。
